name: Solitaire Air
description:
Solitaire Air is the classic solitaire you know and love with a modern interface.

Klondike solitaire is the world's most popular version of this ancient card game!
Lots of different variations with nuances to keep gameplay interesting. Try them all!

Solitaire Air will win you over with its simple rules perfect for players of any age. No experience required!

Why Solitaire Air?
- clean flat design
- personal achievements
- reshuffle boosters

Have fun!
